scripts.API:ClientFlow: npx playwright test -g ClientLogin && npx playwright test -g Client
scripts.API:AdminFlow: npx playwright test -g AdminLogin && npx playwright test -g Admin
scripts.API:EmployeeFlow: npx playwright test -g EmployeeLogin && npx playwright test -g Employee
scripts.API:CandidateFlow: npx playwright test -g CandidateLogin && npx playwright test -g Candidate
scripts.API:AllFlows: npx playwright test -g ClientLogin && npx playwright test -g Client && npx playwright test -g AdminLogin && npx playwright test -g Admin && npx playwright test -g EmployeeLogin && npx playwright test -g Employee && npx playwright test -g CandidateLogin && npx playwright test -g Candidate
